tours.title: Solang Valley Adventure
tours.description: Experience the thrill of Solang Valley with paragliding, zorbing, and stunning Himalayan views. A full-day adventure tour perfect for families and thrill seekers.
tours.itinerary: Morning pickup from hotel → Drive to Solang Valley → Adventure activities → Lunch break → More activities → Return by evening

tours.title: Rohtang Pass Day Trip
tours.description: Visit the iconic Rohtang Pass at 13,050 ft with breathtaking views of glaciers, peaks, and the Lahaul Valley. Snow activities available year-round.
tours.itinerary: Early morning departure → Rohtang Pass → Snow activities → Lunch at Marhi → Return via Gulaba → Evening arrival

tours.title: Old Manali Heritage Walk
tours.description: Explore the charming lanes of Old Manali, visit ancient temples, local cafes, and enjoy the bohemian vibe of this beautiful hillside town.
tours.itinerary: Meet at Mall Road → Walk to Hadimba Temple → Old Manali exploration → Cafe stop → Manu Temple → Return

tours.title: Kullu River Rafting
tours.description: White water rafting on the Beas River in Kullu. An adrenaline-pumping experience through rapids surrounded by lush green mountains.
tours.itinerary: Drive to Pirdi → Safety briefing → Rafting 14km stretch → End at Jhiri → Return to Manali

festivals.title: Manali Winter Carnival
festivals.description: Annual winter festival featuring cultural performances, folk dances, local music, handicraft exhibitions, and adventure sports competitions.

festivals.title: Kullu Dussehra
festivals.description: The world-famous week-long Kullu Dussehra festival where over 200 local deities are brought in processions to the Dhalpur Maidan.

festivals.title: Spring Festival
festivals.description: Celebrate the arrival of spring in the valley with flower exhibitions, live music, trekking events, and local food festivals.

hotels.name: Mountain View Resort
hotels.description: A premium resort overlooking the snow-capped Himalayas with luxurious rooms, a spa, and multi-cuisine restaurant. Perfect for a relaxing mountain getaway.

hotels.name: Riverside Cottages
hotels.description: Cozy wooden cottages right by the Beas River with private balconies, bonfire area, and the soothing sound of flowing water. A nature lover's paradise.

hotels.name: Snow Peak Inn
hotels.description: Budget-friendly hotel in the heart of Manali with clean rooms, hot water, and easy access to Mall Road and local attractions.

hotels.name: Apple Orchard Homestay
hotels.description: Traditional Himachali homestay surrounded by apple orchards with home-cooked meals, cultural experiences, and panoramic valley views.

restaurants.name: Himalayan Kitchen
restaurants.description: Authentic Himachali and North Indian cuisine with a cozy mountain ambiance. Famous for thali meals and local specialties.

restaurants.name: Cafe 1947
restaurants.description: Iconic cafe in Old Manali serving Italian, Continental, and Israeli cuisine with live music evenings and a bohemian vibe.

restaurants.name: Green Leaf Veg Restaurant
restaurants.description: Pure vegetarian restaurant offering South Indian, Chinese, and North Indian dishes. Known for crispy dosas and paneer specials.

menuItems.name: Himachali Thali
menuItems.description: Traditional Himachali meal with dal, rice, roti, sabzi, raita, and pickle

menuItems.name: River Trout Fry
menuItems.description: Fresh Beas river trout marinated in local spices and pan fried to perfection

menuItems.name: Steamed Momos
menuItems.description: Tibetan style steamed dumplings with spicy chutney (8 pcs)

menuItems.name: Wood Fired Margherita Pizza
menuItems.description: Classic margherita with fresh mozzarella, basil, and homemade sauce

menuItems.name: Penne Arrabiata
menuItems.description: Penne pasta in spicy tomato sauce with garlic bread on the side

menuItems.name: Shakshuka
menuItems.description: Middle Eastern style eggs poached in spiced tomato sauce with pita bread

menuItems.name: Masala Dosa
menuItems.description: Crispy dosa filled with spiced potato masala, served with sambar and chutney

menuItems.name: Paneer Butter Masala
menuItems.description: Cottage cheese cubes in rich tomato and butter gravy with naan
